creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
description: five large characters written across top of fan; vertical line of looping characters at far L; small rectangular relief stamp at URC; rectangular relief stamp at far L center
inscription:
Signature, Inscription, Mark, and Seals

[ 富貴有勉強 ] (Wealth and status require true diligence.) (SA)
markings: URC, rectangular red relief; L center rectangular relief: [ 菱潭 ]; on back, top right, in pencil: [Ryotan]
title: Five-word Phrase
